posts.post_content:
Can anyone say [Horned Sliver](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Horned Sliver)?
  
And before you ask, yes. The second set of damage also tramples over, i.e. if he attacks something with 2 toughness he deals 4 damage through trample and kills the thing with no threat to himself.

Posted By: FurySliver (1/29/2010 5:13:42 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Double strike is crazy overpowered; even though this is expensive, getting it out and keeping it out all but guarantees victory. Nothing NOTHING can stand before even a few double strikers. Heck, even ONE double-striker is usually big trouble for just about anything. Except Phytohydra. Phytohydra LOVES double strike, and if your opponent has many slivers including Fury and you have Phytohydra and a few [Valor Made Real](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Valor Made Real)s, give your opponent a big kiss because you will be hard pressed to enjoy yourself more. Back on topic, this sliver is broken. Wizards does a good job keeping the Slivers from having insane abilities, but they were asleep at the wheel for this one. That said, 5/5, obviously.
posts.html:
